snippet: The Lysander Piano Trio, which performed last week at Weill Recital Hall, is one of the few new distinguished groups of its kind in a field where string quartets flourish.
lead_paragraph: The Lysander Piano Trio, which performed last week at Weill Recital Hall, is one of the few new distinguished groups of its kind in a field where string quartets flourish.

headline.seo: Lysander Piano Trio Performs at Weill Recital Hall
headline.main: The Art of Collaboration, in Action
headline.print_headline: The Art of Collaboration, in Action
